title: Define Pydantic models for eval entities
description: Create Pydantic models for EvalSuite, EvalCase, EvalRun, and EvalResult based on architecture spec.
acceptance_criteria: EvalSuite model with name, description, agent_id, default_scorers, cases
EvalCase model with input, expected_tools, expected_output_contains, scorers, min_score
EvalRun model with suite_id, status, summary, timestamps
EvalResult model with scores, score_details, passed
Unit tests cover validation edge cases
